## Bug Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to page '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Fill the field with '...'
4. See error

### Expected Behavior
What should have happened instead of the error.

### Screenshots / Logs
*(If applicable, add screenshots or terminal logs)*

### Environment
- **OS:** [e.g., Windows 11, macOS, Android]
- **Browser/Tool:** [e.g., Chrome, Postman, Insomnia]
- **Version:** [e.g., v1.0.1]

### Severity
- [ ] Critical (Blocks the system / Crashing)
- [ ] Medium (Core feature affected but workaround exists)
- [ ] Low (Visual / Typo / Minor inconvenience)
